content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Fling You drop the weapon you used for the attack. It lands 1d6x5 feet away from your in a random direction.

Melee
Head Rush You are sickened 2.

Ranged
Overextended You trigger reactions as if you had used a move action.

Unarmed
Reflection The spell hits you instead of the target.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #16
